name: Excelsior Warpriest

abilities.name: Sigmar's Boon
abilities.description: Pick a hero or a minion within 4 spaces and remove a wound from their card. If you have wounded an adversary with your Warhammer this turn, heal D3 wounds instead.

abilities.name: Command
abilities.description: Pick one of the actions from the Gryph-hound's behaviour table and make it immediately. You can only make this action once per turn.

renown: If Sigmar's Boon heals 2 wounds in a turn, gain 1 renown.
